snippet: With a playoff spot on the line, the teams combined to draw the best overnight rating of any Sunday prime-time N.F.L. broadcast in 13 years.
abstract: With a playoff spot on the line, the teams combined to draw the best overnight rating of any Sunday prime-time N.F.L. broadcast in 13 years.

headline.main: Giants and Cowboys Lift NBC in Ratings
headline.print_headline: Dallas-New York Means Sunday Night Viewers
